content: <?xml version="1.0"?> <rdf:RDF   xmlns:rdf="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#"   xmlns:dc="http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/"   xmlns:atom="http://www.w3.org/2005/Atom"   xmlns="http://purl.org/rss/1.0/" >  <channel rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk/cgi-bin/webadmin?RSS&L=ANATOMY&v=1.0">  <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk/cgi-bin/webadmin?RSS&L=ANATOMY&v=1.0</dc:identifier>  <title>ANATOMY List</title>  <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk/cgi-bin/webadmin?A0=ANATOMY</link>  <description>ANATOMY List Archives</description>  <dc:date>2014-05-25T14:29:13Z</dc:date>  <image rdf:resource="http://www.lsoft.com/images/listserv_small.gif"/>    <items>   <rdf:Seq>     <rdf:li resource="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ANATOMY;f0b4775c.1405"/> <rdf:li resource="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ANATOMY;ab05f82b.1404"/>     </rdf:Seq>  </items>   </channel>  <image rdf:about="http://www.lsoft.com/images/listserv_small.gif">     <title>Powered by L-Soft's LISTSERV mailing list manager</title>     <link>http://www.lsoft.com/products/listserv-powered.asp</link>     <url>http://www.lsoft.com/images/listserv_small.gif</url> </image>   <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ANATOMY;f0b4775c.1405">   <title>Re: time in lectures and DR session for medical students </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ANATOMY;f0b4775c.1405</link>   <description> Dear Donal<br>I\ufffd\ufffdm an doctor from outsde UE, but the common view within my country is that<br>anatomy is still a basic pillar in medical studies pre and postgraduate. I<br>would not recoment to cut any time in the subject. Also there is a growing<br>part of dayly practice that has to do with virtual imaging in 3D, ultrasound<br>and MR studies.<br>Is only my opinion but after the anatomy course is completed, there should<br>be anatomy imaging course with normal and pathological imaging in order to<br>complement the real anatomy and to meet the current diagnostic criteria.<br>Regards<br>Dr. [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-05-25T10:39:29-04:30</dc:date>   <dc:creator>listasmsd</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ANATOMY;f0b4775c.1405</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ANATOMY;ab05f82b.1404">   <title>time in lectures and DR session for medical students </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ANATOMY;ab05f82b.1404</link>   <description> Hi fellow anatomist,<br><br>I was teaching on a postgraduate course and met up with two surgeons who had very strong views on how much time medical students currently spend learning anatomy in lectures and Dissecting Room sessions.<br><br>Is this a real or a perceived crisis? Does anyone have an opinion on this issue? [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-04-02T20:49:50+01:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Donal Shanahan</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ANATOMY;ab05f82b.1404</dc:identifier> </item>   </rdf:RDF>
